title: What Gaps Does Your Wife Fill in Life?
description:
Eric answers Dr. Laura's request to husbands to explain how their wives have improved their lives. - Dr. Laura: "A good marriage involves selfless effort and a desire to please each other."

How has your marriage improved your life? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment. 

Find me on social media at:

Facebook.com/DrLaura

Instagram.com/DrLauraProgram
